/></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_gravity</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="center"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_margin</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="20dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">app</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:cardElevation</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="10dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">app</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:cardBackgroundColor</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="#FAF5F5"</span>&gt;<br /><br /> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="300dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="300dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_margin</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="10dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:gravity</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="center"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:orientation</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="vertical"</span>&gt;<br /><br /> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">ImageView<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:id</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@+id/imageView_flag"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="match_parent"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="0dp"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_weight</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="1"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">app</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:srcCompat</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@drawable/ic_beauty"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">tools</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:ignore</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="VectorDrawableCompat" </span>/&gt;<br /><br /> &lt;<span style="color: #0033b3;">TextView<br /></span><span style="color: #0033b3;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:id</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="@+id/textView_countryName"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_width</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="wrap_content"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:layout_height</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="wrap_content"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:text</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="Beauty"<br /></span><span style="color: #067d17;"> </span><span style="color: #871094;">android</span><span style="color: #174ad4;">:textSize</span><span style="color: #067d17;">="20dp" </span>/&gt;<br /> &lt;/<span style="color: #0033b3;">LinearLayout</span>&gt;<br />&lt;/<span style="color: #0033b3;">androidx.cardview.widget.CardView</span>&gt;</pre> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Lưu &yacute;:</span></strong> Ảnh được hiển thị lấy từ internet</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Giao diện như sau!</span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 240px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2013.png?alt=media&amp;token=f370e92b-8af5-44f5-9782-67f3c0f587e7" alt="File preview" /></p> <p></p> <hr /> <p>H&atilde;y xem to&agrave;n bộ video b&agrave;i giảng sau đ&acirc;y để hiểu r&otilde; hơn&nbsp;về CardView v&agrave; RecyclerView.</p> <div style="background-image: url('https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fbackground_Video.jpg?alt=media&amp;token=0ae7f287-f72f-496d-b18f-da9d02798468'); background-size: cover; height: 480px; padding-top: 80px; text-align: center; cursor: pointer;" onclick="window.open('https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-android-application-development-y/learn/lecture/11462562?start=0','mywindow');"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPicture%20for%20courses%2Fplayer_Video.png?alt=media&amp;token=98c3b4ec-62ef-4f07-814d-f4dc052f8bfc" style="height: 150px; border-radius: 50%; border: 10px solid #FEDE00;" /> <h1 style="font-size: 40px; color: white; margin: 10px; text-align: center;">Đối tượng giao diện n&acirc;ng cao dạng danh s&aacute;ch RecyclerView &amp; CardView - phần 1&nbsp;</h1> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 30px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; text-align: center;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Video từ nguồn học liệu gốc</em></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: #1f9afe; text-align: center;">Credit:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.udemy.com" target="_blank" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; background: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; ease-in-out 0s; text-decoration-line: none; color: #009fe6;">Udemy</a></p> </div> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Bạn h&atilde;y ch&uacute; &yacute; bật phụ đề tiếng Việt được đ&oacute;ng g&oacute;p bởi FUNiX để hiểu r&otilde; hơn.</em></p> <div <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="5ca24210297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@b00760d950a249e291ed69534b0e4986" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Đối tượng giao diện nâng cao dạng danh sách RecyclerView &amp; CardView - phần 2</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@b00760d950a249e291ed69534b0e4986" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@6c1acbc79eef474b81fec05e6ed7ee91"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="5ca24210297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@6c1acbc79eef474b81fec05e6ed7ee91" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">RECYCLERVIEW L&Agrave; G&Igrave;?</h2> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Việc hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch hoặc dạng lưới l&agrave; một trong c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng việc UI phổ biến nhất trong Android. C&aacute;c danh s&aacute;ch kh&aacute;c nhau từ đơn giản đến phức tạp. Một danh s&aacute;ch TextView c&oacute; thể hiển thị dữ liệu đơn giản, chẳng hạn một danh s&aacute;ch mua sắm. Một danh s&aacute;ch phức tạp, chẳng hạn một danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c điểm đến trong kỳ nghỉ c&oacute; ch&uacute; th&iacute;ch, c&oacute; thể hiển thị cho người d&ugrave;ng nhiều chi tiết b&ecirc;n trong một lưới cuộn c&ugrave;ng với c&aacute;c ti&ecirc;u đề.</span></p> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Để hỗ trợ tất cả c&aacute;c trường hợp n&agrave;y, Android cung cấp RecyclerView.</span></p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2018.png?alt=media&amp;token=c4706f66-338d-4be1-8b21-f0e300a4378e" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Tiền th&acirc;n của&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">RecyclerView l&agrave; đối tượng ListView - Một đối tượng View đ&atilde; được Android x&acirc;y dựng từ trước, tuy nhi&ecirc;n hoạt động của ListView c&oacute; nhiều hạn chế, đặc biệt l&agrave; hiệu năng khi quản l&yacute; danh s&aacute;ch số lượng lớn c&aacute;c phần tử l&agrave; thấp, do đ&oacute;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">RecyclerView</span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">&nbsp;l&agrave; phi&ecirc;n bản cải tiến của&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">ListView</span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">&nbsp;m&agrave; Google ra mắt từ phi&ecirc;n bản Android 5.1 (Lollipop).</span></p> <p><strong>Lợi &iacute;ch lớn nhất của RecyclerView, đ&oacute; l&agrave; n&oacute; rất hữu &iacute;ch cho c&aacute;c danh s&aacute;ch lớn</strong></p> <ul> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Theo mặc định, RecyclerView chỉ hoạt động để xử l&yacute; hoặc vẽ c&aacute;c đối tượng đang hiển thị tr&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh. V&iacute; dụ, nếu danh s&aacute;ch của bạn c&oacute; một ng&agrave;n phần tử nhưng chỉ mười phần tử được hiển thị, RecyclerView chỉ l&agrave;m c&ocirc;ng việc đủ để vẽ mười phần tử tr&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh. Khi người d&ugrave;ng cuộn, RecyclerView t&igrave;m ra phần tử mới n&ecirc;n được hiển thị tr&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh v&agrave; chỉ l&agrave;m c&ocirc;ng việc đủ để hiển thị c&aacute;c phần tử n&agrave;y.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Khi một phần tử cuộn ra khỏi m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh, c&aacute;c View của c&aacute;c phần tử n&agrave;y c&oacute; thể được t&aacute;i sử dụng. Điều đ&oacute; c&oacute; nghĩa l&agrave; phần tử c&oacute; chứa nội dung mới được cuộn l&ecirc;n m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh. Đặc điểm n&agrave;y của RecyclerView gi&uacute;p tiết kiệm nhiều thời gian xử l&yacute; v&agrave; gi&uacute;p danh s&aacute;ch cuộn mượt m&agrave; hơn.</span></p> </li> <li> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Khi một phần tử thay đổi, thay v&igrave; vẽ lại to&agrave;n bộ danh s&aacute;ch, RecyclerView chỉ cập nhật lại một phần tử đ&oacute;. Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; một lợi &iacute;ch rất lớn khi hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch phức tạp!</span></p> </li> </ul> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Trong sơ đồ dưới đ&acirc;y, bạn c&oacute; thể thấy một View c&oacute; chứa dữ liệu ABC. Sau khi View đ&oacute; cuộn ra khỏi m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh, RecyclerView t&aacute;i sử dụng lại View đ&oacute; cho dữ liệu mới XYZ.</span><br /></span></p> <p style="padding-left: 90px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2019.png?alt=media&amp;token=d9c5da04-e8e5-41e3-9778-c1cd4f019d27" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><strong>M&ocirc; h&igrave;nh điều phối</strong></p> <p>Nếu bạn từng đi du lịch giữa c&aacute;c quốc gia m&agrave; sử dụng c&aacute;c ổ cắm điện kh&aacute;c nhau, bạn c&oacute; lẽ biết c&aacute;ch cắm c&aacute;c thiết bị của bạn v&agrave;o c&aacute;c ổ cắm bằng c&aacute;ch sử dụng c&aacute;c bộ chuyển đổi. Bộ chuyển đổi gi&uacute;p bạn chuyển đổi một loại ph&iacute;ch cắm sang loại kh&aacute;c.</p> <p>RecyclerView sử dụng một Adapter để chuyển đổi dữ liệu ứng dụng th&agrave;nh một thứ g&igrave; đ&oacute; m&agrave; RecyclerView c&oacute; thể hiển thị m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng cần thay đổi việc ứng dụng lưu trữ v&agrave; xử l&yacute; dữ liệu như thế n&agrave;o.&nbsp;</p> <p style="padding-left: 60px;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2020.png?alt=media&amp;token=24e3e264-8f97-4b28-8b02-ac60455daa5f" alt="File preview" /></p> <p></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Khi d&ugrave;ng đến RecylerView th&igrave; bạn cũng cần l&agrave;m việc với:</strong></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">RecyclerView.Adapter: Quản l&yacute; dữ liệu v&agrave; cập nhật dữ liệu cần hiển thị v&agrave;o View (phần tử hiển thị trong RecyclerView)</span></p> </li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">RecyclerView.LayoutManager: Lớp quy định c&aacute;ch m&agrave; vị tr&iacute; c&aacute;c phần tử trong RecyclerView hiển thị, c&oacute; thể sử dụng c&aacute;c lớp kế thừa LinearLayoutManager, GridLayoutManager</span></p> </li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">RecyclerView.ItemAnimator: Lớp để x&acirc;y dựng c&aacute;ch thức hoạt h&igrave;nh (động) cho c&aacute;c sự kiện tr&ecirc;n phần tử hiển thị, như hiệu ứng khi th&ecirc;m phần tử v&agrave;o, x&oacute;a phần tử khỏi RecyclerView</span></p> </li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"> <p><span face="Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">RecyclerView.Viewholder: L&agrave; một lớp được mở rộng từ lớp ViewHolder. N&oacute; chứa th&ocirc;ng tin View để hiển thị một phần tử từ layout của n&oacute;. View holder cũng đưa th&ecirc;m c&aacute;c th&ocirc;ng tin m&agrave; RecyclerView cần để di chuyển hiệu quả hơn trong m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh</span></p> </li> </ul> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2021.png?alt=media&amp;token=44ea19ff-055c-451d-b524-76fbedf3e605" alt="File preview" /></p> <h2 style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 30px 40px 15px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: white; letter-spacing: 1px; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; background-color: #0e529f; text-align: center;">THỰC H&Agrave;NH VỚI RECYCLER VIEW</h2> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;">Ch&uacute;ng ta sẽ c&ugrave;ng đi thực h&agrave;nh để tạo một ứng dụng nhỏ, hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch th&ocirc;ng tin d&acirc;n số của c&aacute;c nước tr&ecirc;n thế giới. Ứng dụng n&agrave;y kết hợp giữa&nbsp;<strong>RecyclerView</strong> v&agrave; <strong>CardView</strong>.</p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;">Giao diện ứng dụng sẽ như sau:</p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 210px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2022.png?alt=media&amp;token=00762644-e5f2-4dc1-b582-57be16e15483" alt="File preview" /></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; 1&nbsp;<strong></strong><strong>item_country</strong></p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">package </span><span style="color: #000000;">com.funix.country</span>;<br /><br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">public class </span><span style="color: #000000;">Country </span>{<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">private final int </span><span style="color: #871094;">flag</span>;<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">private final </span><span style="color: #000000;">String </span><span style="color: #871094;">countryName</span>;<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">private final int </span><span style="color: #871094;">population</span>;<br /><br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">public </span><span style="color: #00627a;">Country</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">String </span>countryName, <span style="color: #0033b3;">int </span>flag, <span style="color: #0033b3;">int </span>population) {<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.<span style="color: #871094;">countryName </span>= countryName;<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.<span style="color: #871094;">flag </span>= flag;<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.<span style="color: #871094;">population </span>= population;<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">public int #0033b3;">public </span><span style="color: #000000;">String </span><span style="color: #00627a;">getCountryName</span>() {<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">return </span><span style="color: #871094;">countryName</span>;<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">public int </span><span style="color: #00627a;">getPopulation</span>() {<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">return </span><span style="color: #871094;">population</span>;<br /> }<br />}</pre> <p>Tạo đối tượng&nbsp;<strong>CountryAdapter</strong> l&agrave; lớp mở rộng từ <strong>RecyclerView.Adapter</strong>, n&oacute; l&agrave;m nhiệm vụ hiển thị dữ liệu l&ecirc;n c&aacute;c <strong>RecyclerView</strong> Item.</p> <pre style="color: #000000; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">package </span>com.funix.country;<br /><br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.content.Context;<br style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.view.ViewGroup;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.widget.ImageView;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.widget.TextView;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>android.widget.Toast;<br /><br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>androidx.annotation.<span style="color: #808000;">NonNull</span>;<br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;<br /><br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">import </span>java.util.List;<br /><br /><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public class </span>CountryAdapter <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">extends </span>RecyclerView.Adapter&lt;CountryAdapter.CountryHolder&gt; {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private static final </span>String <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">TAG </span>= CountryAdapter.<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">class</span>.getName();<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private final </span>List&lt;Country&gt; <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countries</span>;<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private final </span>Context <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">context</span>;<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private final </span>LayoutInflater <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">mLayoutInflater</span>;<br /><br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public </span>CountryAdapter(Context context, List&lt;Country&gt; datas) {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">context </span>= context;<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countries </span>= datas;<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">mLayoutInflater </span>= LayoutInflater.<span style="font-style: italic;">from</span>(context);<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public </span>CountryHolder onCreateViewHolder(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">final </span>ViewGroup parent, <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">int </span>viewType) {<br /> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">// Lấy view từ res/layout/item_country.xml<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>View itemCountry = <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">mLayoutInflater</span>.inflate(R.layout.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">item_country</span>, parent, <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">false</span>);<br /><br /> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">//Xử l&yacute; onclick cho item view<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>itemCountry.setOnClickListener(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">new </span>View.OnClickListener() {<br /> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public void </span>onClick(View v) {<br /> handleRecyclerItemClick((RecyclerView) <span style="color: #660e7a;">parent</span>, v);<br /> }<br /> });<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">return new </span>CountryHolder(itemCountry);<br /> }<br /><br /><br /> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public void </span>onBindViewHolder(CountryHolder holder, <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">int </span>position) {<br /> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">// Lấy th&ocirc;ng tin country trong danh s&aacute;ch itemCountry qua vị tr&iacute; (position)<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>Country country = <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countries</span>.get(position);<br /><br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">int </span>imageResId = country.getFlag();<br /><br /> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">// Đổ dữ liệu của Country v&agrave;o c&aacute;c View con trong item_layout<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span>holder.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">flagView</span>.setImageResource(imageResId);<br /> holder.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countryNameView</span>.setText(country.getCountryName());<br /> holder.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">populationView</span>.setText(<span style="color: #008000; font-weight: bold;">"Population: " </span>+ country.getPopulation());<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #808000;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #808000;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public int </span>getItemCount() {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">return this</span>.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countries</span>.size();<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;">// Xử l&yacute; click v&agrave;o phần tử tr&ecirc;n danh s&aacute;ch<br /></span><span style="color: #808080; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">private void </span>handleRecyclerItemClick(RecyclerView recyclerView, View itemView) {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">int </span>itemPosition = recyclerView.getChildLayoutPosition(itemView);<br /> Country country = <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countries</span>.get(itemPosition);<br /><br /> Toast.<span style="font-style: italic;">makeText</span>(<span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">this</span>.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">context</span>, country.getCountryName(), Toast.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">LENGTH_LONG</span>).show();<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public static class </span>CountryHolder <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">extends </span>RecyclerView.ViewHolder {<br /> ImageView <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">flagView</span>;<br /> TextView <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countryNameView</span>, <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">populationView</span>;<br /><br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">public </span>CountryHolder(<span style="color: #808000;">@NonNull </span>View v) {<br /> <span style="color: #000080; font-weight: bold;">super</span>(v);<br /> <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">flagView </span>= v.findViewById(R.id.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">imageView_flag</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">countryNameView </span>= v.findViewById(R.id.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">textView_countryName</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold;">populationView </span>= v.findViewById(R.id.<span style="color: #660e7a; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">textView_population</span>);<br /> }<br /> }<br />}</pre> <p>Sử dụng <strong>RecyclerView</strong> để nh&uacute;ng Adapter m&agrave; ch&uacute;ng ta vừa x&acirc;y dựng b&ecirc;n tr&ecirc;n trong MainActivity như sau:</p> <pre style="color: #080808; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 10.5pt;"><span style="color: #0033b3;">package </span><span style="color: #000000;">com.funix.country</span>;<br /><br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">android.os.Bundle</span>;<br /><br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView</span>;<br /><br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">java.util.ArrayList</span>;<br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">import </span><span style="color: #000000;">java.util.List</span>;<br /><br /><span style="color: #0033b3;">public class </span><span style="color: #000000;">MainActivity </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">extends </span><span style="color: #000000;">AppCompatActivity </span>{<br /><br /> <span style="color: #9e880d;">@Override<br /></span><span style="color: #9e880d;"> </span><span style="color: #0033b3;">protected void </span><span style="color: #00627a;">onCreate</span>(<span style="color: #000000;">Bundle </span>savedInstanceState) {<br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">super</span>.onCreate(savedInstanceState);<br /> setContentView(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">layout</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">activity_main</span>);<br /><br /> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//T</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ạ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">o danh s&aacute;ch qu</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ố</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">c gia<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">List</span>&lt;<span style="color: #000000;">Country</span>&gt; <span style="color: #000000;">countries </span>= getListData();<br /> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//l</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ấ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">y đ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ố</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">i t</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ượ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">ng RecyclerView t</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ừ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> layout file<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">RecyclerView recyclerView </span>= (<span style="color: #000000;">RecyclerView</span>) <span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>.findViewById(<span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">id</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">recyclerView</span>);<br /> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//Khai b&aacute;o lo</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ạ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">i giao di</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ệ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">n cho RecyclerView (1 c</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ộ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">t - nhi</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ề</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">u h&agrave;ng)<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">recyclerView</span>.setLayoutManager(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>LinearLayoutManager(<span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>));<br /> <span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;">//Đ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Courier New',monospace;">ổ</span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> Adapter v&agrave;o RecyclerView<br /></span><span style="color: #8c8c8c; font-style: italic;"> </span><span style="color: #000000;">recyclerView</span>.setAdapter(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>CountryAdapter(<span style="color: #0033b3;">this</span>, <span style="color: #000000;">countries</span>));<br /> }<br /><br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">private </span><span style="color: #000000;">List</span>&lt;<span style="color: #000000;">Country</span>&gt; <span style="color: #00627a;">getListData</span>() {<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">List</span>&lt;<span style="color: #000000;">Country</span>&gt; <span style="color: #000000;">list </span>= <span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>ArrayList&lt;<span style="color: #000000;">Country</span>&gt;();<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">list</span>.add(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Country(<span style="color: #067d17;">"Afghanistan"</span>, <span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">drawable</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">ic_afganistan</span>, <span style="color: #1750eb;">98000000</span>));<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">list</span>.add(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Country(<span style="color: #067d17;">"Angola"</span>, <span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">drawable</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">ic_angola</span>, <span style="color: #1750eb;">320000000</span>));<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">list</span>.add(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Country(<span style="color: #067d17;">"Antigua &amp; Barbuda"</span>, <span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">drawable</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">ic_antigua_barbuda</span>, <span style="color: #1750eb;">142000000</span>));<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">list</span>.add(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Country(<span style="color: #067d17;">"Argentina"</span>, <span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">drawable</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">ic_argentina</span>, <span style="color: #1750eb;">25000000</span>));<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">list</span>.add(<span style="color: #0033b3;">new </span>Country(<span style="color: #067d17;">"Australia"</span>, <span style="color: #000000;">R</span>.<span style="color: #000000;">drawable</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">ic_australia</span>, <span style="color: #1750eb;">126000000</span>));<br /> <span style="color: #000000;">drawable</span>.<span style="color: #871094; font-style: italic;">ic_bhutan</span>, <span style="color: #1750eb;">126000000</span>));<br /><br /> <span style="color: #0033b3;">return </span><span style="color: #000000;">list</span>;<br /> }<br />}</pre> <p>Chạy chương tr&igrave;nh v&agrave; xem th&agrave;nh quả!</p> <hr style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; box-sizing: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;">H&atilde;y xem to&agrave;n bộ video b&agrave;i giảng sau đ&acirc;y để hiểu r&otilde; hơn&nbsp;về c&aacute;ch sử dụng Recycler v&agrave; CardView!</p> <div style="background-image: thể tự t&igrave;m hiểu một số nội dung tham khảo th&ecirc;m ở một số video tr&ecirc;n nguồn t&agrave;i liệu gốc dưới đ&acirc;y:</span></p> <ul> <li><a href="https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-android-application-development-y/learn/lecture/11638408?start=0" target="_blank">Fragments kết hợp c&ugrave;ng RecyclerView Phần 1</a></li> <li><a href="https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-android-application-development-y/learn/lecture/11638472?start=0" target="_blank">Fragments kết hợp c&ugrave;ng RecyclerView Phần 2</a></li> <li><a href="https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-android-application-development-y/learn/lecture/11638702?start=0" target="_blank">Fragments kết hợp c&ugrave;ng RecyclerView Phần 3</a></li> </ul> <p></p> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="5ca24210297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@dbef49a516eb42728b12f01a4476e2b9" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 5.1 - Xây dựng ứng dụng Truyện Cười (Màn danh sách chủ đề) - Phần 1</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@dbef49a516eb42728b12f01a4476e2b9" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@f87b72c67f3b4d50b2dc1fa35d14dea9"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="5ca24210297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@f87b72c67f3b4d50b2dc1fa35d14dea9" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></li> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Drawable, Color Schemes, String constants, Style &amp; themes</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</span></span></li> </ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c đối tượng View System</span></b></span></li> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView, ImageView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm:&nbsp;</span></span>LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> <li><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">C&aacute;c đối tượng xử l&yacute; logic:&nbsp;</span></span></b>Activity, Fragment, Dialog, RecycleView, Adapter</li> <li><strong>Đối tượng Assets chứa t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n chương tr&igrave;nh: </strong>tham khảo&nbsp;<a href=" https://giasutinhoc.vn/labs/lab-android-co-ban/huong-dan-doc-du-lieu-tu-assets-trong-android-2/" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y.</a></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng Truyện Cười Phần 1 v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2030.png?alt=media&amp;token=2d6781a4-6114-4ed2-8815-52534fa31a08" alt="File preview" />&nbsp;</span></span><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2029.png?alt=media&amp;token=0a58a2f7-adc6-4c97-bdef-108fd0ee16a2" alt="File preview" /><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2031.png?alt=media&amp;token=39141467-b9d8-4186-806e-d92c57484b2c" alt="File preview" /><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2032.png?alt=media&amp;token=13c266a9-6f68-4011-a01e-52348e554657" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 4 giao diện hiển thị c&aacute;c m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh chức năng của ứng dụng truyện cười. Trong đ&oacute; m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh đầu l&agrave; m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh ch&agrave;o mừng, m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh thứ 2 l&agrave; danh s&aacute;ch chủ đề truyện, m&agrave;n thứ 3 l&agrave; danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c truyện trong chủ đề. Khi người d&ugrave;ng click v&agrave;o 1 truyện n&agrave;o đ&oacute; sẽ hiển thị nội dung truyện ở m&agrave;n thứ 4. Tại m&agrave;n thứ 4, c&oacute; thể vuốt sang tr&aacute; i- phải để chuyển sang truyện kế tiếp.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. Gợi &yacute;</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">: </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 layout <b>xml</b> trong thư mục res/layout<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:</span><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span face="Calibri Light, sans-serif" style="font-family: 'Calibri Light', sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></span></span>TextView, ImageView</p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">LinearLayout, ScrollView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Thẻ include</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c đối tượng giao diện:&nbsp;</span></span>RecyclerView, Adapter</p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c đối tượng logic:&nbsp;</span></span>Activity, Fragment, Dialog</p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng bộ icon, data sau v&agrave; lưu v&agrave;o trong assets <a href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1k4fzoyjJLNSdetKhKf7GTVTwu73HZii_?usp=sharing" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>.</span></span></p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2033.png?alt=media&amp;token=d08e6876-ea9e-4244-a1a7-608d86019138" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Lấy ảnh ic_back, ic_face trong kho ảnh vecter assets của AndroidStudio</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2034.png?alt=media&amp;token=f71d2d78-46d4-4afb-b4f9-f2a9decb8bec" alt="File preview" /><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2036.png?alt=media&amp;token=29256730-bf06-4abc-b5bc-f81e3845aad7" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">3. Hướng dẫn</span></b></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">A. X&acirc;y dựng giao diện<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Bước 1:</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> Chuẩn bị t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n <b>drawable, string, themes, colors </b>như sau:</span></span></p> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%206%2FH%C3%ACnh%2035.png?alt=media&amp;token=9f3bbf76-461d-435c-b950-4e6a84ea08cc" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Nội dung file </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">res/values/strings.xml</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt;"> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">string </span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="app_name"</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;TruyenCuoi&lt;/</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">string </span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="txt_congai"</span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;">&nbsp;</span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><br />4</b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">. Lưu &yacute;:<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">- C&aacute;c bạn ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể sử dụng layout ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; <b>RelativeLayout </b>để x&acirc;y dựng giao diện b&agrave;i n&agrave;y nh&eacute;.<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">- Sử dụng style </span><span style="line-height: 107%; color: #000000;">Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.<b>NoActionBar</b> </span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">để ẩn actionbar của layout</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>3</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">0 ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="5ca24210297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@cd5a38363ae0462b883475b73db648ad" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 5.2 - Xây dựng ứng dụng Truyện Cười (Màn danh sách truyện cười) - Phần 2</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@cd5a38363ae0462b883475b73db648ad" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@05fd6bf9f1384b37bfaecf6a7718ca47"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="5ca24210297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@05fd6bf9f1384b37bfaecf6a7718ca47" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: paragraph;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</span></b></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">- Tiếp b&agrave;i Lab 5.1</span><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-&nbsp;</span></span>Kiến thức t&igrave;m hiểu:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.journaldev.com/10096/android-viewpager-example-tutorial" target="_blank">ViewPager</a></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng Truyện Cười Phần 2 v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện danh s&aacute;ch topic sau:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&nbsp; <v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f"> <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"> <v:formulas> <v:f eqn="if font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">).commit();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">gotoM002Screen(String topicName) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">backToM001Screen() {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; gotoM001Screen();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">gotoM003Screen(ArrayList&lt;StoryEntity&gt; listStory, StoryEntity story) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;"><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;">&nbsp;</span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><b>4</b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">. Lưu &yacute;:</span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c bạn ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể sử dụng layout ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; <b>RelativeLayout </b>để x&acirc;y dựng giao diện b&agrave;i n&agrave;y nh&eacute;.<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng style </span><span style="line-height: 107%;">Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.<b>NoActionBar</b> </span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">để ẩn actionbar của layout<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000000;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng thẻ <b>include</b> để th&ecirc;m actionbar cho layout main</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>3</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">0 ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng Truyện Cười Phần 3 v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><v:shapetype line-height: 107%;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; giao diện hiển thị danh s&aacute;ch c&aacute;c truyện trong chủ đề. Khi người d&ugrave;ng click v&agrave;o 1 chủ đề th&igrave; sẽ v&agrave;o m&agrave;n n&agrave;y, tại m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh danh s&aacute;ch truyện, khi click v&agrave;o truyện n&agrave;o đ&oacute; sẽ hiển thị nội dung truyện ở m&agrave;n thứ 4.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">3. LayoutInflater.<i>from</i>(</span><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman';
